text: Ate jihare loka pahilam tom hi madine vica vasade hana ate imana te tike ho'e hana. Jihara unham de kola hijarata karake a'unda hai, uha usa nala prema karade hana ate uha apane dilam vica unham nala khudaka nahim rakhade. Jihara muhajiram nu dita janda hai uha usa tom apane dilam vica ko'i icha nahim rakhade bhavem uha khuda bhukhe hona. Ate jihara bada apane mana de lalaca tom baca li'a gi'a tam ihi loka safalata pa'una vale hana
